experience.description: Working on a major vendor migration project as a full stack engineer

Fully developed and owned a project that integrated DynamoDB data with Snowflake transferring 156k existing records and processes 2000 change data events everyday. Undewent the LEAP training in full stack development which includes technologies like Angular, Spring, and Java.

Worked on the Billpay application developing capabilities to send notifications to customers. Created an API and an async application to handle the events from a vendor and send it to the notification service. Coded the logic and completed perfomance, resource and functional testing.
Was a part of the Credit Card Squad. Worked on batch processing using Spring Batch to sync the batch cycle of multiple files.Created GraphQL endpoint for an existing Payments REST API.
Worked on user-facing features ensuring that the designs were implemented accurately. Created the request callback modal.
